text.p: These are some of the leading stories in Kuwait's press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Civil service commission proposes a raise of 60 million dinars ($198 million) in salaries and wages in 1997/98 budget to 1.29 billion dinars.
- Lebanese parliament speaker Nabih Berri arrives in Kuwait on Sunday.
- Iraq's Arab League envoy, Nabil Negm, says Baghdad has no enmity towards sisterly Kuwait.
- Cabinet to discuss on Sunday the resignation by Health Minister Anwar al-Nouri. Newspapers last month said Nouri had presented his resignation for private reasons.
- Foreign Minister Sheikh Sabah al-Ahmad al-Sabah receives message from Egyptian counterpart Amr Moussa.
